players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to protect the town."
Bob: "That accusation is baseless and rushed. Diana, why are you so quick to point fingers without evidence? Let's focus on finding the real threat together."
Bob: "Accusing me without proof only divides us, Diana. If you truly want to protect the town, suggest a plan or a player to investigate instead of blindly blaming."
Diana: "Bob is the only mafia here. I have proof from my investigation last night. Voting him out is our only chance to save the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
